pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Free Download Manager (FDM) is a powerful, modern download accelerator and organizer. It features intelligent dynamic file segmentation and safe multipart downloading technology to accelerate downloads. FDM supports HTTP, HTTPS, FTP, BitTorrent protocols and integrates with popular web browsers.
Key features include: - Download acceleration through dynamic segmentation - BitTorrent support with DHT, PEX, and magnet links - Browser integration via extensions - Video download from popular streaming sites - Built-in media preview - Site login and password management - Traffic usage control and bandwidth limiting - Scheduler for automated downloads - Pause and resume capabilities - Multi-language interface
Note: This is a binary package. The source code for Free Download Manager version 6.x is proprietary. Earlier versions (2.5 to 3.9.7) were open source under the GPL license.

use.flag: Enable GStreamer support for media preview functionality. This allows previewing video and audio files before or during download. Requires gst-plugins-base and gst-plugins-good with appropriate codec support.
